earthrefiner.name: Earth Refiner
earthrefiner.description: Will refine mars earth into materials to sell

intergalaticmarket.name: Intergalatic Market
intergalaticmarket.description: Helps with selling materials to Earth and other places

oxygenerator.name: Oxygenerator
oxygenerator.description: Provides the colony with fresh oxygen, can provide a human enviroment

accomodationpod.name: Accomodation Pod
accomodationpod.description: This will be where your coloniers will live

launchpad.name: Launch Pad
launchpad.description: Provides a location for colonier's ships to land

watermine.name: Water Mine
watermine.description: Sucks Mars ice up from the ground and breaks it into H2O

storagefacility.name: Storage Facility
storagefacility.description: It will store your valuable and not valuable materials

workshop.name: WorkShop
workshop.description: Crafts more advance technology and equipment from base materials

espionageembassy.name: Espionage Embassy
espionageembassy.description: The ultimate spying building, activate your spies by sending them on missions for robbing and counter spy protection

barracks.name: Barracks
barracks.description: The building of might, ready to send your troops to war, defend, attack and war with the barrack

researchfacility.name: Research Facility
researchfacility.description: Science galore! This is the place to research new techonology and concepts

expeditionhut.name: Expedition Hut
expeditionhut.description: The center and base for starting and leading expeditions through the rocky lands of Mars
